## Research Question: Which classification method best predicts match outcome (win vs. loss) using gameplay statistics and match characteristics?

### Classification Methods Used: XGBoost; kNN; Random Forest

## Data Wrangling

### Combine Data
```{r}
CODGames <- bind_rows(CODGames1 %>% mutate(Player = "Player1"),
                       CODGames2 %>% mutate(Player = "Player2"))
```

### Scale XP variables
```{r}
CODGamesScaled <- CODGames %>% 
  mutate(ScaledXP = ifelse(XPType == "10% Boost", TotalXP / 1.1, TotalXP / 2.1)) %>% 
  select(Eliminations, Deaths, Score, Damage, ScaledXP) %>% 
  drop_na()
```
